roleset.name: say, warn
roleset.note: CAUTION-V NOTES: Expect all the usual constructions from the other verbs-of-saying:fronted, split, inverted. (from caution.01-v)
CAUTION-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to caution-v. VN class advise-37.9-1. Fn class statement. Framed by Katie. (from caution.01-n)

example.name: just utterance
example.text: Takeover stock traders were puzzled by the Reliance filing and cautioned that it doesn't mean Mr. Steinberg will definitely seek control.
example.arg: that it doesn't mean Mr. Steinberg will definitely seek control

example.name: with hearer
example.text: Hold on to those funny braids! [you]-1 wanted *trace*-1 to caution her as the sets started to roll around once more.
example.arg: Hold on to those funny braids

roleset.name: full of caution
roleset.note: CAUTIOUS-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to careful.01-j. (from cautious.01-j)

example.text: Also if you are feeding your children multivitamins you should be highly cautious of this too .
example.arg: if you are feeding your children multivitamins

example.name: All args, "about" phrase
example.text: He is cautious about who he does business with because he doesn't want the fuss of having to clean up their messes.
example.arg: about who he does business with
because he doesn't want the fuss of having to clean up their messes.
